Verses: 1 oruvan Oru Sthireeyai Vivaagampannikkondapinbu, Avalidaththil Ilachchaiyaana Kaariyaththaik Kandu, Avalmel Piriyamatravanaanaal, Avan Thalludhalin Seettai Ezhudhi, Aval Kaiyile Koduththu, Avalaith Than Veettilirundhu Anuppividalaam.
2 aval Avanudaiya Veettaivittup Ponapinbu, Veroruvanukku Manaiviyaagalaam.

3 andha Irandaam Purushanum Avalai Veruththu, Thalludhalin Seettai Ezhudhi, Aval Kaiyile Koduththu, Avalaith Than Veettilirundhu Anuppivittaalum, Avalai Vivaagampannina Andha Irandaam Purushan Irandhuponaalum,

4 aval Theettuppattabadyanaal, Avalaith Thallivitta Avaludaiya Mundhinapurushan Thirumbavum Avalai Manaiviyaagach Serththukkollak Koodaadhu; Adhu Karththarukku Munbaaga Aruvaruppaanadhu; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkum Dhesaththinmel Paavam Varappannaayaaga.

5 oruvan Oru Pennaip Pudhidhaai Vivaagampanniyirundhaal, Avan Yuththaththirkup Purappadavendaam; Avanmel Yaadhoru Velaiyum Sumaththavendaam; Avan Oru Varushapariyandham Than Veettil Than Ishtappadiyirundhu, Thaan Vivaagampannina Sthireeyaich Sandhoshappaduththuvaanaaga.
6 thirikaiyin Adikkallaiyaavadhu Adhin Merkallaiyaavadhu Oruvarum Adagaaga Vaangak Koodaadhu; Adhu Jeevanai Adaguvaanguvadhupolaagum.

7 than Sagodhararaagiya Isravel Puththiraril Oruvanaith Thirudi, Adhinaal Aadhaayandhedi, Avanai Vitruppotta Oruvan Agappattaal, Andhath Thirudan Kolaiseyyappadavendum; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkakkadavaai.

8 kushtarogaththaikkuriththu Leviyaraagiya Aasaariyar Ungalukkup Podhikkum Yaavaiyum Gavaniththuch Seyyumbadi Migavum Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Naan Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Seyyak Gavanamaayiruppeergalaaga.
9 neengal Egipthilirundhu Purappattuvarugira Vazhiyile Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Miriyaamukkuch Seydhadhai Ninaiththukkollungal.
10 piranukku Nee Edhaagilum Kadanaagakkoduththaal, Avan Kodukkum Adagai Vaanga Nee Avan Veettirkul Piravesikkavendaam.
11 veliye Nirpaayaaga; Kadan Vaanginavan Andha Adagai Veliye Unnidaththil Konduvaruvaanaaga.
12 avan Thariththiranaanaal, Nee Avan Adagai Vaiththukkondu Niththiraiseyyaamal,

13 avan Than Vasthiraththaip Pottup Paduththukkondu Unnai Aaseervadhikkumbadi, Pozhudhupogumbodhu, Thirumba Andha Adagai Avanukkuk Koduththuvidavendum; Adhu Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Unakku Needhiyaayirukkum.
14 un Sagodhararilum, Un Dhesaththin Vaasalgalilulla Anniyarilum Ezhaiyum Elimaiyumaana Koolikkaaranai Odukkaayaaga.

15 avan Velaiseydha Naalildhaane, Pozhudhupogumunne, Avan Kooliyai Avanukkuk Koduththuvidavendum; Avan Ezhaiyum Adhinmel Aavalumaayirukkiraan; Adhaik Kodaavittaal Avan Unnaik Kuriththuk Karththarai Nokki Muraiyiduvaan; Adhu Unakkup Paavamaayirukkum.
16 pillaigalukkaagap Pidhaakkalum, Pidhaakkalukkaagap Pillaigalum Kolaiseyyappadavendaam; Avanavan Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Avanavan Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
17 nee Anniyanudaiya Niyaayaththaiyum Thikkatra Pillaiyin Niyaayaththaiyum Purattaamalum, Vidhavaiyin Vasthiraththai Adagaaga Vaangaamalum Irundhu,
18 nee Egipthile Adimaiyaayirundhadhaiyum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Angeyirundhu Meettukkonduvandhadhaiyum Ninaippaayaaga; Aagaiyaal, Ippadichcheyyumbadi Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren.

19 nee Un Payirai Arukkaiyil Un Vayalile Oru Arikkattai Maradhiyaai Vaiththu Vandhaayaanaal, Adhai Eduththu Varumbadi Thirumbip Pogavendaam; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Un Kaippirayaasaththilellaam Unnai Aaseervadhikkumbadi, Adhaip Paradhesikkum Thikkatrapillaikkum Vidhavaikkum Vittuviduvaayaaga.
20 nee Un Olivamaraththai Udhirththuvittapinbu, Kombile Thappiyirukkiradhaip Parikkumbadi Thirumbip Pogavendaam; Adhaip Paradhesikkum Thikkatra Pillaikkum Vidhavaikkum Vittuviduvaayaaga;
21 nee Un Thiraatchappazhangalai Aruththapinbu, Marupatiyum Adhai Arukkath Thirumbippogavendaam; Adhaip Paradhesikkum Thikkatra Pillaikkum Vidhavaikkum Vittuviduvaayaaga.
22 nee Egipthile Adimaiyaayirundhadhai Ninaippaayaaga; Aagaiyaal, Ippadich Seyyumbadi Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren.
